code: @Override public ContextCustomizer createContextCustomizer(Class<?> testClass, List<ContextConfigurationAttributes> configAttributes) {     // We gather the explicit mock definitions here since they form part of the     // MergedContextConfiguration key. Different mocks need to have a different key.     DefinitionsParser parser = new DefinitionsParser().     parser.parse(testClass).     return new MockitoContextCustomizer(parser.getDefinitions()). }
